name: ElasticExportShoppingCOM
description: This plugin adds the format ShoppingCOM to the Elastic Export.
author: plentysystems AG
license: GNU AFFERO GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 19 November 2007

shortDescription.de: Die Integration des Datenformats ShoppingCom-Plugin ermöglicht die Artikeldatenübertragung zum Preisportal shopping.com über den elastischen Export.
shortDescription.en: The integration of the data format ShoppingCom-Plugin enables the transfer of item data to the price search engine shopping.com via the elastic export.
